boardgame.name: Saloon Tycoon
boardgame.description: Players are Saloon owners in an old west gold rush town. They've purchased lots on the four corners of the main crossroads and need to expand their small establishments into thriving businesses. Their goal is to create massive centers for commerce and entertainment in the wilds of the West. To boost their success, they_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;ll need to attract the wealthy and famous citizens of the town while keeping away the less savory characters._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;This is a building and tile placement game where the purpose of the game is to build the best saloon. The game is played by each player taking a board and then taking turns going clockwise from the first player earning gold, taking an action, building and collecting bonuses._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The player with the most reputation points at the end of the game wins!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: For RUSS From Kickstarter only! For all gold and bag from the Kickstarter. Includes shipping.

***NOTE: THIS IS A PRE-ORDER*** Salon Tycoon is expected to ship from the publisher in Q3, 2016. This listing is for the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Deluxe Edition_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; of the game offered during the Kickstarter campaign. This edition will not be sold generally at retail. 1 x Copy of Saloon Tycoon Deluxe Edition with real FOOL_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;S GOLD NUGGETS to be used as the gold resource in the game AND a special burlap drawstring bag to keep them in AND 2 exclusive boards to hold the general pool of nuggets and supply cubes PLUS all Stretch Rewards! Also includes 6 Kickstarter Exclusive mini-expansions: The Community The Outskirts Underground Scorpion Farm General Store Rooftops We do not yet know the shipping weight for this game, so shipping charges will be determined when the game arrives from the publishers. GLGames uses the lowest cost shipping option available, with no handling fees of any kind. Please contact us if you have any questions.

Like new condition from a smoke free home. Game is punched, but cards are still sealed. Includes Boomtown expansion and gold nuggets in burlap bag (they have tarnished in storage). There is a small ding on one box corner. Buyer pays shipping from zip code 44202 or may pick up available in the Cleveland, Ohio area. Payment accepted via PayPal, Amazon gift card, or cash for local pick up. New users may be asked to pay via Amazon gift card.
